description: Get the water source and container ready
name: Prepare water and container
pseudocode:
1. Get water
2. Get a container (pot, kettle, etc.)

description: Heat the water until it boils
name: Heat water to boiling
pseudocode:
1. Place the container with water on the heat source (stove, fire, etc.).
2. Turn on the heat source.
3. Wait for the water to boil (observe for bubbles and steam).
